'''Quicksand Adventurer (I)''' is an [[achievement]] set in the category ''[[Sumeru: The Gilded Desert - Series I]]''. The achievements are earned by completing Open World Time Trial Challenges in [[Hypostyle Desert]], [[Land of Upper Setekh]], and [[Land of Lower Setekh]].
